name: A Quiet Night
description:
Shaemora the Unrepentant. Known to your friends as Penny. 

You're a demon on the run from the forces of Hell, trying to carve out a life for yourself on the mortal coil. 

But your quiet night is about to go sideways thanks to one phone call...

inkJam 2020

I'd say I rather overscoped and should have spent more time developing the story rather than allowing the systems of each scene to sprawl in the way they did. But I had fun playing around with some areas of ink that I've not been able to in the past. 

I also should have taken the time to run the game through a spellchecker, so please enjoy whatever typos you find! I hate it!!

I wasn't able to test properly on mobile, so you may encounter issues playing on a phone browser.

Credits

Written, designed, and built by George Lockett
Music:

  • Cue 1 - Guitars only- dark- moody- brooding- tense (Manic Kinetic)

Special thanks to Olivia Wood for playtesting and generally being the best.
